name: NOVATERRA
description:
Earth is rotten. The air is barely breathable outside the domes. The little drinking water that's left is only available to those who can pay the most. They decided Earth wasn't enough anymore. They're sending a team to an uninhabited planet to terraform it. Humanity's last hope. I'm the one they sent to make sure everything goes according to the plan.

Don't be afraid to explore. Use your flashlight!

Soundtrack

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Jump: Space Bar

Laser Beam: Left Mouse Button (Hold)

Grenade Launcher: Right Mouse Button

Look Ahead: Left Shift
